items.sentence: With a little more patience, you would have succeeded.
Tom wasn\'t aware that Mary was hoping he\'d kiss her.
Tom wished he could tell Mary about what had happened.
Tom wished he could tell Mary what she wanted to know.
Tom and Mary were sitting in the back seat of the car.
Tom and Mary were watching television when I got home.
The only problem was that Tom didn\'t want to be here.
Tom knew that Mary couldn\'t do what she wanted to do.
Tom never admits he\'s wrong even when he knows he is.
Tom dropped out of the race when he fell off his bike.
